    1. allocate(int)

Interface NativeAllocator

Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface NativeAllocator
An allocation function for native buffers.
Since:
23.0

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Object
    allocate(int byteSize)
    Allocates a new native buffer of byteSize bytes.

  • Method Details

    • allocate

      Object allocate(int byteSize)
      Allocates a new native buffer of byteSize bytes. The return value must be a Truffle object as expected by TruffleString.FromNativePointerNode.
      Since:
      23.0
